QuestData.Title: Black Blood of Yogg-Saron
QuestData.Description: Angrathar, the Wrathgate... I watched as the metal holding the gate together pulsed and undulated as if it were alive! In 50 years I've never seen metal "breathe."$B$BOnly ones who knew anything about it were the tuskarr. They called it the "Black Blood of Yogg-Saron" and told me to keep my distance.$B$BThere's a sinkhole outside Icemist Village to the west called the Pit of Narjun. I've heard of these sinkholes being rich with this strange ore. If you head that way, could you try and get me some samples?
QuestData.LogDescription: Borus Ironbender at Agmar's Hammer in the Dragonblight wants you to recover 10 Black Blood of Yogg-Saron Samples.
QuestData.RewardText: It's so light... As if it weighs nothing at all! I'll need time to analyze the metal and see if I can do anything with it! Tests! I need to run tests!$B$BI'll keep in contact, $n. If anything comes of this, you'll be the first to know.
